net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_RollExpression_setStaticRoll
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Specifies a static value to be used as the raw value for the roll(s). If the type "staticRoll" has not been specified, it will be added.
Note: To expose potential abuse of this feature, a message is broadcast to all of chat indicating the value being force-rolled each time this expression is rolled.
arg (0) = RollExpression arg (1) = value to set the raw roll
